body: Waiting English and uncensored
@iminwgame yeah!! Bunny walker is touching this not Queen Bee omg I'm so hype for this!!

Guys! Finally this series got a HENTAI ANIME ADAPTATION that covers chapter 1 - 4 in Hentai 4 episodes!!! Also blessed by Lune-Soft Media (Bunnywalker / Antechinus studios) which guarantee high quality hentai too!! Episode 1-2 will be launched on 1st July and episode 3-4 will come around 5th August. Blessed Kurosu Gatari work!! For teaser preview, go check the lune-soft site here --> https://www.lune-soft.jp/news/24656
For those of you asking for anal sex w/h principal in chapter 5, here it is after page 200. Anal sex scene and character descriptions, good news. But still waiting for chapter 6!!!
